FuncDef: This command allows the operator to add an optional Data TLV to PDU and increase the frame on the wire by the specified amount. Note that this command only configures the size of the padding added to the PDU, and does not configure the total size of the frame on the wire.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the size, in octets, of the optional Data TLV. Values-0, 3 to 2000. ParamDefault: Default- 0
